title: National football players to wear Clits 9/11 memorials?
subtitle: It is rumored that national football was fined for violating uniform rules by wearing a souvenir uniform on September 11, 2016 during football games.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The National Football Association fined players for violating uniform rules by wearing a souvenir dress on September 11, 2016 during the football games on September 11, 2016.
